name: Facility X
description:
Facility X is a 3D Thriller/Puzzle game developed by Gathered Entertainment. It blends hunter/hunted gameplay with underwater exploration via drone and follows the story of a secret government facility. You must explore the facility and navigate its dangers with the ultimate goal of uncovering a sinister mystery.

Here is the link to our feedback form. We would greatly appreciate any feedback or suggestions!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScKbeI9T2ix8kU6TWxRUTlf6KP1d3SCiIvy4VTl...

  • And you!
